page.title: 03Communication
page.content: In our area we communicate mainly by word of mouth and by postal services. Telephones help people to keep in touch with each other. In our area mail is delivered by the postman in his van or on his bicycle. There is a newspaper delivery boy. Most people find out their news by telephone. In Milton there is a telephone at the Forge Garage. Some people get local news from the village shop, or by reading the Western Gazette or the Blackmore Vale magazine. Many people have bicycles to ride around on and most people have cars to get about in. There is no regular bus service, but some take children to and from school. "Team Contact"is the local parish magazine and is delivered to the door.
